body:
Comment 1: 
i think this is working as intended.
you can't use a [...] inside another type.
it is only a composite literal syntax, not a type syntax.
that is, you can write a composite literal of the specific form

[...]T{foo}

as a special case.  you cannot use [...] inside arbitrary types.
_Owner changed to **g...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
